description: PIMS 4207 BD MSP: Strengthening National Capacities for the Operationalization, Consolidation, and Sustainability of Belize's Protected Areas System

subproject.description: It is the intention of the PPG is to develop a MSP proposal aimed at strengthening the operational and financial sustainability of Belize’s National Protected Area System. The project to be developed under the PPG will support the institutionalization of recommendations developed under the  2003 National Protected Areas Policy and Systems Plan (NPAPSP) as a means of removing barriers to effective system function and financial sustainability. The development of the MSP will be nationally Executed (NEX) by the National Protected Areas Commission with the direct support of the Fisheries Department, Forest Department, the Protected Areas Conservation Trust, UNDP RCU, and the UNDP Belize CO.
subproject.title: PIMS 4207. PPG BD MSP Belize

title: PIMS 4207. PPG BD MSP Belize
